Package edu.sru.cpsc.webshopping.controller.purchase

Class MarketListingPageController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.cpsc.webshopping.controller.purchase.MarketListingPageController
@Controller public class MarketListingPageController extends Object
Manages the functionality of the MarketListing page This page is used for ing and interacting with market listings

    • attemptPurchase

      @PostMapping("/viewMarketListing/attemptPurchase") public String attemptPurchase(@Validated Transaction newTransaction, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Attempts to purchase from a MarketListing Opens the next page in the purchasing pipeline - submitting the shipping address
      Parameters:
      newTransaction - a partially filled out Transaction holding the number of items to buy
      model - the page model - passed by dependency injection
      Returns:
      the confirmShippingPage
